column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/4332be71a2b15315ddc299e2f3695054df30eb95 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Boost_chrono seems to exist as of Boost 1.47. I suppose that means we want to link against it anywhere we're on Boost 1.47 or higher.\n
